condition.ptxt: Blower won’t work even when blower speed selector is ON

action.ptxt: Replace fuse to check for short.
Check blower motor referring to Blower Motor Inspection .
Check relay referring to Blower Motor Relay Inspection .
Check blower motor controller referring to Blower Motor Controller Inspection .
Check HVAC control module referring to HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection (for Vehicle without A/C) or HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection .
Repair as necessary.

condition.ptxt: Air temperature is not changed even when temperature selector is changed

action.ptxt: Repair Temperature control door.
Check actuator linkage referring to Actuator Linkage Inspection .
Replace hoses.
Replace heater core referring to Heater Core Removal and Installation .
Check temperature control actuator referring to Temperature Control Actuator Inspection .
Check HVAC control module referring to HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection (for Vehicle without A/C) or HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection .

condition.ptxt: Air outlet port is not changed when air flow selector is changed

action.ptxt: Repair air flow control door.
Check actuator linkage referring to Actuator Linkage Inspection .
Check air flow control actuator referring to Air Flow Control Actuator Inspection .
Check HVAC control module referring to HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection (for Vehicle without A/C) or HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection .

condition.ptxt: No fresh air inlet is changed.

action.ptxt: Check related fuses and check for short circuit to ground.
Check air intake control actuator.
Repair air intake control door.
Check actuator linkage referring to Actuator Linkage Inspection .
Check HVAC Control module referring to HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection (for Vehicle without A/C) or HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection .
Repair or replace as necessary.

condition.ptxt: Heating performance is poor (for additional heater system)

action.ptxt: Check related fuses and check for short circuit to ground.
Check additional heater relays referring to Additional Heater Relay Inspection (Diesel Engine Model) .
Check additional heater assembly referring to Additional Heater Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection (Diesel Engine Model) .
Check ECM.
Repair as necessary.
